page.title: 06ROADS - BROCKWORTH AREA
page.content: A survey of traffic carried out on 11.6.85 between 09.50 and 10.20 at the Cross Hands roundabout (junction of the A417 and A46) revealed the following: direction: CHELTENHAM STROUD OXFORD GLOUCESTER car 119 60 142 273 bus 1 0 0 2 bike 0 0 1 0 taxi 0 0 0 0 m/bike 6 1 3 3 tractor 0 0 1 0 van 19 2 9 43 lorry 10 2 50 50 At the same time 27 vehicles called in at the Cross Hands service station for petrol etc.. Public Transport include bus services to Gloucester.Total passenger traffic for one day in spring numbered 1281 and revenue was 487.60 (both directions).
